content.question: The author assumes that the <math alttext="O O B 3 6 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>OO</mtext><mtext>B</mtext><mtext>365</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> group is mostly concerned about canceling the fireworks displays at Old Orchard Beach because

choices.label: jobs will be lost in the fireworks manufacturing industry in Maine
revenue will be lost from tourists attracted by the firework displays
the organization bought the fireworks and would not know what to do with them
the number of piping plover nests could decrease

content.answer: revenue will be lost from tourists attracted by the firework displays

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe the author's perspective and assumptions.
